mapper.select: select distinct 'SPECIMEN' subject, '1' pid, 'TISSUE' id, 'TISSUE' name, ORDR_DIRECT_DT time, ORDR_CD ordrCd, -- 처방코드 EXAM_CD examCd, -- 검사코드, EXAM_NO examNo, -- 검사번호, SPCN_NO spcnNo, -- 검체번호, SPCN_EXAM_ORDR_TYP_CD spcnExamOrdrTypCd -- 검체검사처방유형코드 from SSSPMORDR a -- 검체검사처방기본 where a.RESCH_PAT_ID != #{patientId} limit 10
